message: Let's divide fairly, I'll take a bit more
Let's split it evenly.  It's a fair start.
I'll give you a bit more, but I still want the bigger share
Let's be reasonable.  I'm willing to take slightly more, but we need to move towards a split we can both agree on.
I'll meet you halfway between my last offer and your last offer
I'm getting tired of this.  Let's make a deal close to even - if we don't agree soon, we both lose a lot.
